metadata.Title: CVE-2021-0605 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In pfkey_dump of af_key.c, there is a possible out-of-bounds read due to amissing bounds check. This could lead to local information disclosure inthe kernel with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is notneeded for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID:A-110373476

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
